short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: uses AI to replace your voice with a celebrity's or character's voice. Record, select a template, and generate a new voice for fun

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI Voice Cover is an innovative Google Chrome extension that utilizes advanced artificial intelligence technology to easily achieve voice conversion and overlay. The feature of this plugin lies in the ability for users to record their voice, choose different voice effects and templates for overlay, creating a variety of voice effects. Users can change not only the pitch and timbre of their voice but also switch voice styles, providing a new way for voice expression. AI Voice Cover also offers various customization options for users to adjust voice conversion effects according to their needs, catering to different application requirements for different scenarios and purposes, bringing users a new experience in voice processing.

This plugin is not only suitable for entertainment but also plays an important role in fields such as voice production, audio editing, and language learning. Users can use AI Voice Cover for voice creation, voice processing work, as well as for language learning and communication skill improvement. Whether creating interesting voice content in personal life or engaging in voice creation and processing in professional fields, AI Voice Cover provides users with convenience and innovation.

[Disclaimer]
Disclaimer: The AI Voice Cover extension is intended for personal entertainment and educational purposes only and should not be used for any commercial purposes or infringement of others' rights. Users are responsible for all consequences and liabilities when using this extension, and the developer is not liable for any losses caused by the use of this plugin.
